metadata.summary: My name is Sudip Sarkar (First Name: Sudip, Last Name: Sarkar). I am a Male. DOB: 07-MAY-2003. Height 6 feet. I'm a passionate full-stack web developer with a strong focus on backend technologies, system design, and problem-solving. I love building scalable systems and working with high-performance programming languages.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

C++.comment: C++ is my go-to language for competitive programming—fast, efficient, and powerful!

Java.comment: I have a solid grasp of Core Java, OOP, and multithreading.

JavaScript.comment: JavaScript is my playground! I use it extensively for dynamic and interactive web applications.

Python.comment: I primarily use Python for DSA. It's my second favorite after C++, but I don’t use it for large-scale applications.

Go.comment: Go is my top choice for building high-performance, scalable backend services. Simple, fast, and efficient!

web_development.experience: I have built multiple full-stack applications using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.
web_development.comment: I enjoy creating seamless user experiences with well-optimized APIs.

backend_knowledge.comment: Backend development is my stronghold. I focus on building secure, scalable, and efficient APIs.

Football.comment: I love playing and watching Football. It's the perfect way to refresh my mind!

coding.comment: Coding isn't just work for me; it's something I truly enjoy. Solving problems is both fun and rewarding!

cinema.comment: I love watching movies before sleep. A great story is always a win! My favorite directors: Satyajit Ray, Christopher Nolan (Who himself was insipired by Satyajit Ray). Favorite actors: Uttam Kumar, Soumitra Chatterjee.

Bangla.comment: Bangla is my mother tongue, and I speak it fluently.

English.comment: I can communicate well in English and am continuously improving.

Hindi.comment: I understand Hindi well but am not fluent in speaking.

projects.name: Movie Ticket Booking System
projects.description: A console-based Java application for booking movie tickets, featuring a layered architecture with models, services, and controllers for theatre and show selection.
projects.achievements: Implemented a robust booking system with automated dependency management using Maven.

projects.name: Parallel Merge Sort Implementation
projects.description: A Java application comparing parallel and sequential Merge Sort algorithms using multi-threading for large datasets.
projects.achievements: Demonstrated performance improvements in parallel sorting with modular design.
